from vpython import *
scene = canvas()

Length_I = 10
g = 9.81
theta0 = 5 * pi / 180

ball = sphere(pos=vector(Length_I*sin(theta0), -Length_I*cos(theta0), 0), radius=Length_I/10, color=color.red)
rod = cylinder(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), axis=ball.pos, radius=ball.radius/2)

t = 0
dt = 0.01
while True:
    rate(100)
    theta = theta0 * cos(sqrt(g/Length_I) * t)
    ball.pos = vector(Length_I*sin(theta), -Length_I*cos(theta), 0)
    rod.axis = ball.pos
    t += dt
